name: Ubuntu KDE Desktop
postCreateCommand:
apt update && DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt install -y kde-standard tigervnc-standalone-server dbus-x11 git && git clone https://github.com/novnc/noVNC.git /opt/noVNC && git clone https://github.com/novnc/websockify /opt/noVNC/utils/websockify && mkdir -p /root/.vnc && echo -e '#!/bin/sh
unset SESSION_MANAGER
unset DBUS_SESSION_BUS_ADDRESS
exec startplasma-x11 &' > /root/.vnc/xstartup && chmod +x /root/.vnc/xstartup && vncserver :1 -geometry 720x1600 -depth 24 && cd /opt/noVNC && ./utils/novnc_proxy --vnc localhost:5901 --listen 6080 &
